title: Sayonara No Natsu
lyrics: Hikaru umi ni ka sumu funewha Sayo nara no ki teki no koshimasu Yurui saka o ori te yukeba Natsu iro no kaze ni ae ru kashira Watashi no ai sore wa melodī Takaku hikuku utau no Watashi no ai sore wakamome Takaku hikuku tobu no Yuuhi no naka yon de mitara Yasa shii anata ni aeru kashira Dare ka ga hiku pi ano no oto Umi nari mitai ni kikoe masu Osoi gogo o yuki kau hito Natsu iro no yume o hakobu kashira Wa tashi no ai sore wa daiarī Hibi no pēji tsuzuru no Wa tashi no ai sore wa kobune Sora no umi o yuku no Yuuhi no naka furi kaereba Ana ta wa watashi o sagasu kashira Sanpomichi ni yure ru kigi wa Sayo nara no kage o oto shimasu Furui chaperu ka zami no tori Natsu iro no machi wa mi eru kashira Ki nou no ai sore wa namida Yagate kawaki kieru no Ashi ta no ai sore wa rufuran Owari no nai kotoba Yuuhi no naka me guriaeba Ana ta wa watashi o daku kashira
